fields.name: src_subject_id
fields.description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

fields.name: interview_age
fields.description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
fields.notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

fields.name: interview_date
fields.description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
fields.notes: Required field

fields.name: gender
fields.description: Sex of the subject
fields.notes: M = Male; F = Female

fields.name: phq_1
fields.description: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
fields.notes: 0=Not bothered at all; 1=Bothered a little; 2=Bothered a lot

fields.name: phq_2
fields.description: Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless
fields.notes: 0=Not bothered at all; 1=Bothered a little; 2=Bothered a lot

fields.name: phq_3
fields.description: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
fields.notes: 0=Not bothered at all; 1=Bothered a little; 2=Bothered a lot

fields.name: phq_4
fields.description: Feeling tired or having little energy
fields.notes: 0=Not bothered at all; 1=Bothered a little; 2=Bothered a lot

fields.name: phq_5
fields.description: Poor appetite or overeating
fields.notes: 0=Not bothered at all; 1=Bothered a little; 2=Bothered a lot

fields.name: phq_6
fields.description: Feeling bad about yourself  or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
fields.notes: 0=Not bothered at all; 1=Bothered a little; 2=Bothered a lot

fields.name: phq_7
fields.description: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
fields.notes: 0=Not bothered at all; 1=Bothered a little; 2=Bothered a lot

fields.name: phq_8
fields.description: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed. Or the opposite  being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
fields.notes: 0=Not bothered at all; 1=Bothered a little; 2=Bothered a lot

fields.name: phq_9
fields.description: Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself
fields.notes: 0=Not bothered at all; 1=Bothered a little; 2=Bothered a lot

fields.name: phq_10
fields.description: If you circled any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people
fields.notes: 0=Not bothered at all; 1=Bothered a little; 2=Bothered a lot

fields.name: phqscore
fields.description: Total Score PHQ
fields.notes: phq_1+phq_2+phq_3+phq_4+phq_5+phq_6+phq_7+phq_8; greater than or equal to 10 consistent with current depression

fields.name: site
fields.description: Site
fields.notes: Study Site

fields.name: clinicid
fields.description: Clinic ID

fields.name: ran002
fields.description: Was the subject randomized?
fields.notes: 0=No; 1=Yes; -9=unknown; 2=No meds; 3=No community care

fields.name: days_baseline
fields.description: Days since baseline

fields.name: suicidalityharmself_scale
fields.description: On a scale of 1 to 7, what is your intent to harm yourself right now
fields.notes: 1=lower; 7=high

fields.name: phq9afl
fields.description: Triggers Intent to Harm flag on

fields.name: suicidalitycontrolimpulse
fields.description: Do you believe you could control your impulses?
fields.notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

fields.name: phq
fields.description: Sum Of PHQ 1-9
fields.notes: (Patient Health Questionnaire) 1-9

fields.name: iphq
fields.description: Imputed Phq
fields.notes: (Patient Health Questionnaire) 1-9

fields.name: xphq
fields.description: Sum of PHQ 1-8
fields.notes: (Patient Health Questionnaire) 1-8

fields.name: ixphq
fields.description: Imputed Sum of  (Patient Health Questionnaire) 1-8
fields.notes: (Patient Health Questionnaire) 1-8

fields.name: interv
fields.description: Intervention Status
fields.notes: 1=ITV, intervention; 0=TAU, treatment as usual

fields.name: version_form
fields.description: Form used

fields.name: week
fields.description: Week in level/study
fields.notes: 99=week 10-week 14

fields.name: phq_v8_1
fields.description: Over the past week, how often have you felt little interest or pleasure in doing things?
fields.notes: 0=Not at all; 1=Several Days; 2=More than half the days; 3=Nearly every day

fields.name: phq_v8_2
fields.description: Over the past week, how often have you bothered by feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?
fields.notes: 0=Not at all; 1=Several Days; 2=More than half the days; 3=Nearly every day

fields.name: phq_v8_3
fields.description: Over the past week, how often have you bothered by  trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?
fields.notes: 0=Not at all; 1=Several Days; 2=More than half the days; 3=Nearly every day

fields.name: phq_v8_4
fields.description: Over the past week, how often have you bothered by feeling tired or having little energy?
fields.notes: 0=Not at all; 1=Several Days; 2=More than half the days; 3=Nearly every day

fields.name: phq_v8_5
fields.description: Over the past week, how often have you bothered by a poor appetite or overeating?
fields.notes: 0=Not at all; 1=Several Days; 2=More than half the days; 3=Nearly every day

fields.name: phq_v8_6
fields.description: Over the past week, how often have you bothered by feeling bad about yourself- or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down?
fields.notes: 0=Not at all; 1=Several Days; 2=More than half the days; 3=Nearly every day

fields.name: phq_v8_7
fields.description: Over the past week, how often have you bothered by trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching the television?
fields.notes: 0=Not at all; 1=Several Days; 2=More than half the days; 3=Nearly every day

fields.name: phq_v8_8
fields.description: Over the past week, how often have you bothered by moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite- being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual?
fields.notes: 0=Not at all; 1=Several Days; 2=More than half the days; 3=Nearly every day
